content: तिज् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (Strictly {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} of तिज्) (तितिक्षते, तितिक्षित) {@--1@} To endure, bear. {@--2@} To put up with, suffer patiently or with courage; तितिक्षमाणस्य परेण निंदां <ls>M. 1. 17</ls>; तांस्तितिक्षस्व भारत <ls>Bg. 2. 14</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2. 12</ls>; <ls>Ki. 13. 68</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 47.</ls> {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (तेजयति-ते, तेजित) {@--1@} To sharpen, whet; कुसुमचापमतेजयदंशुभिः <ls>R. 9. 39.</ls> {@--2@} To stir up, excite, instigate.
